alert.note: Alert for Antelope Valley; San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys; Southern Salinas Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 29 at 7:44AM PDT until October 30 at 8:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 8 AM PDT MONDAY... ...FREEZE WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 8 AM PDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 29 expected. * WHERE...Southern Salinas Valley, San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys and Antelope Valley. * WHEN...For the first Freeze Warning, until 8 AM PDT this morning. For the second Freeze Warning, from 2 AM to 8 AM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops and other sensitive vegetation. Extended exposure to cold can cause hypothermia for animals and people. Vehicle windshields will be frosted.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Plan for extra time to defrost vehicle windshields.

area.areaDesc: Antelope Valley; San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys; Southern Salinas Valley
